description: Arsenal Capital Partners, a private-equity firm that invests in the industrials and healthcare sectors, has amassed $5.4 billion for two new funds, including its first vehicle targeting fast-growing, high-technology businesses.
title: Arsenal Capital Raises $5.4 Billion for Two New Funds
title_page: Arsenal Capital Raises $5.4 Billion for Two New Funds - WSJ
maintext:
Arsenal Capital Partners, a private-equity firm that invests in the industrials and healthcare sectors, has amassed $5.4 billion for two new funds, including its first vehicle targeting fast-growing, high-technology businesses.
The New York firm said Monday it closed its sixth flagship investment vehicle, Arsenal Capital Partners VI LP, at $4.3 billion. The sum is significantly above both the $3 billion fundraising target and the size of the predecessor vehicle, which closed in 2019 with about $2.4 billion.
